metadata.Meta description: Explore the critical role of open-source software in addressing software supply chain security threats and learn about the evolving landscape of Linux security. Stay informed about the latest SUSE container updates, including security patches for suse/pcp, dbus-1, perl, and glibc. This advisory addresses important security vulnerabilities such as CVE-2023-31484 and CVE-2023-32001, ensuring the safety and integrity of your containerized environment.
